00028   // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029   //  filter interface
00030   // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031   // template<typename STATE>
00032   // struct filter_base {
00033   //   virtual ~filter_base() {}
00034   //   virtual STATE process(STATE s) = 0;
00035   //   virtual STATE get() const = 0;
00036   //   virtual void reset(STATE s) = 0;
00037   // } ;

00039   
00040   template<typename COEFF,
00041            typename STATE>
00042   class iir {
00043   public:
00044     typedef STATE state_type;
00045     typedef std::vector<COEFF> vector_type_coeff;
00046     typedef std::vector<STATE> vector_type_state;
00047     
00048     iir(size_t N)
00049       : a_(N, 0)
00050       , b_(N, 0)
00051       , in_(N, 0)
00052       , out_(N, 0) {
00053       if (N == 0)
00054         throw std::runtime_error("iir: N=0 not allowed");
00055       a_[0] = COEFF(1);
00056     }
00057     
00058     iir(const vector_type_coeff& a,
00059         const vector_type_coeff& b)
00060       : a_(a)
00061       , b_(b)
00062       , in_ (a.size(), 0)
00063       , out_(a.size(), 0) {
00064       if (a_.size() != b_.size())
00065         throw std::runtime_error("iir: a.size() != b.size()");
00066     }
00067     
00068     iir<COEFF,STATE>& init(const vector_type_coeff& a,
00069                            const vector_type_coeff& b) {
00070       if (a_.size() != a.size() || b_.size() != b.size())
00071         throw std::runtime_error("iir: a.size() != b.size()");
00072       std::copy(a.begin(), a.end(), a_.begin());
00073       std::copy(b.begin(), b.end(), b_.begin());
00074 //       reset();
00075       return *this;
00076     }
00077     
00078     void reset(STATE s=STATE(0)) {
00079       for (size_t i(0), n(in_.size()); i<n; ++i)
00080         in_[i] = out_[i] = STATE(0);
00081       in_.back() = s;
00082     }
00083     
00084     STATE process(STATE s) {
00085       in_.back()  = s;
00086       out_.back() = b_[0]*in_.back();
00087       for (size_t i(1), n(in_.size()); i<n; ++i) {
00088         out_.back() += b_[i]*in_[n-1-i] - a_[i]*out_[n-1-i];
00089       }
00090       if (a_[0] != COEFF(1))
00091         out_.back() /= a_[0];
00092       std::copy(in_.begin() +1, in_.end(),  in_.begin());
00093       std::copy(out_.begin()+1, out_.end(), out_.begin());
00094       return out_.back();
00095     }
00096     
00097     STATE get() const { return out_.back(); }
00098 
00099   protected:
00100     vector_type_coeff a_;
00101     vector_type_coeff b_;
00102 
00103   private:
00104     vector_type_state in_;
00105     vector_type_state out_;
00106   } ;
00107   
00108   template<typename STATE>
00109   class loop_filter_2nd {
00110   public:
00111     typedef iir<STATE, STATE> iir_type;
00112     
00113     loop_filter_2nd(double xi,
00114                     double dwl,
00115                     double fs)
00116       : iir_(2)
00117       , xi_(xi)
00118       , dwl_(dwl)
00119       , fs_(fs) {
00120       init(xi, dwl, fs);
00121       reset();
00122     }
00123     // virtual ~loop_filter_2nd() {}
00124 
00125     void update_ppb(double ppb) {
00126       init(xi_, dwl_, fs_*(1.-1e-9*ppb));
00127     }
00128 
00129     void init(double xi,
00130               double dwl,
00131               double fs) {
00132       const double wl = dwl*2*M_PI;
00133       const double wn = wl/2/xi;
00134       const double k0 = 1.;
00135       const double kd = 1.;
00136       const double tau1 = k0*kd/wn/wn;
00137       const double tau2 = xi*2/wn;
00138       const double ts2 = 0.5/fs; // ts/2
00139       // loop filter coefficients from s -> z transform with prewarping
00140       //   (1 + s*tau1) / (s*tau2)
00141       typename iir_type::vector_type_coeff a(2);
00142       typename iir_type::vector_type_coeff b(2);
00143       a[0] =  1.0;
00144       a[1] = -1.0;
00145       b[0] = ts2/tau1*(1.+1./std::tan(ts2/tau2));
00146       b[1] = ts2/tau1*(1.-1./std::tan(ts2/tau2));
00147       iir_.init(a, b);
00148     }
00149     void reset(STATE s=0) { iir_.reset(s); }
00150     STATE process(STATE s) { return iir_.process(s); }
00151     STATE get() const { return iir_.get(); }
00152   protected:
00153   private:
00154     iir_type iir_;
00155     double xi_;
00156     double dwl_;
00157     double fs_;
00158   } ;

00160   template<typename STATE,
00161            typename COEFF>
00162   class iir_lowpass_1pole {
00163   public:
00164     iir_lowpass_1pole(double tc,
00165                       double fs) 
00166       : s_(0)
00167       , alpha_(1) {
00168       init(tc, fs);
00169     }
00170     
00171     void init(double tc,   // time constant
00172               double fs) { // sampling rate
00173       alpha_ = std::max(COEFF(0), std::min(COEFF(1), COEFF(1./(tc*fs))));
00174     }
00175     void reset(STATE s=0) { s_ = s; }
00176     STATE process(STATE s) { 
00177       s_ = (1 - alpha_)*s_ + alpha_*s; 
00178       return s_;
00179     }
00180     STATE get() const { return s_; }
00181   protected:
00182   private:
00183     STATE s_;
00184     COEFF alpha_;
00185   } ;

00187   template<typename STATE>
00188   class integrator {
00189   public:
00190     typedef STATE state_type;
00191     
00192     integrator() : s_(0) {}
00193     
00194     STATE get() const { return s_; }
00195     STATE process(STATE s) { return (s_ += s); }
00196     void reset(STATE s=0) { s_=s; }
00197   protected:
00198   private:
00199     STATE s_;
00200   } ;
00201 
00202   template<typename STATE>
00203   class integrator_constraint {
00204   public:
00205     typedef STATE state_type;
00206     
00207     integrator_constraint(state_type min,
00208                           state_type max) 
00209       : s_((min+max)/2)
00210       , min_(min)
00211       , max_(max) {}
00212     
00213     STATE get() const { return s_; }
00214     STATE process(STATE s) { 
00215       s_ = bound(s_+s);
00216       return s_;
00217     }
00218     void reset(STATE s=0) { s_=(s==0) ? (min_+max_)/2 : bound(s); }
00219   protected:
00220     STATE bound(STATE s) const {
00221       return (s < min_) ? min_ : (s > max_ ? max_ : s);
00222     }
00223   private:
00224     STATE s_;
00225     const STATE min_;
00226     const STATE max_;
00227   } ;
00228   
00229   template<typename STATE>
00230   class integrator_modulo {
00231   public:
00232     typedef STATE state_type;
00233     
00234     integrator_modulo(STATE modulo) 
00235       : s_(0)
00236       , modulo_(modulo) {}
00237     STATE get() const { return s_; }
00238     STATE process(STATE s) {
00239       s_ = modulo(s_+s);
00240       return s_;
00241     }
00242     void reset(STATE s=0) { s_=modulo(s); }
00243   protected:
00244   private:
00245     STATE modulo(STATE s) const {
00246       return (s > modulo_/2) ? modulo(s-modulo_) : ((s <= -modulo_/2) ? modulo(s+modulo_) : s);
00247     }
00248     STATE s_;
00249     const STATE modulo_;
00250   } ;
00251   
00252   template<typename F1,
00253            typename F2>
00254   class filter_pair {
00255   public:
00256     typedef typename F2::state_type state_type;
00257     typedef typename std::pair<F1, F2> pair_type;
00258     
00259     filter_pair(const F1& f1,
00260                 const F2& f2)
00261       : fp_(f1, f2) {}
00262     
00263     state_type get() const { return fp_.second.get(); }
00264     state_type process(state_type s) {
00265       return fp_.second.process(fp_.first.process(s));
00266     }
00267     void reset(state_type s=0) { 
00268       fp_.first.reset(s); 
00269       fp_.second.reset(fp_.first.get()); 
00270     }
00271   protected:
00272   private:
00273     pair_type fp_;
00274   } ;
00275 } // namespace filter
